Articles.Content:
(deleted)

Edited December 22, 2019 by deepspacecreeper
Of course you can do this. Just make sure to post the mods you use and the fact that the game is KSP with the video! And I'm fairly sure monetization is OK as long as you say you're playing KSP.

Yes, you're free to create monetized KSP content for Youtube

The complete, official answer:

I uploaded a gameplay video to Youtube. Is it okay for me to monetize it?

Yes, by all means. If you are having many views and want to seize the opportunity, go ahead. We just ask to be given credit, a mention and a link to our website is enough. You must also make it perfectly clear that we are the copyright holders of KSP.
